overview: Quentin Gainz is looking sharp, but Jonah Marx is more interested in what's going on underneath his clothes. Quentin obliges him and undresses, throwing his belt around Jonah's neck and pulling him in closer. High school memories persist as Markie More and Derek Bolt share a beer by the pool. With their wives away on a day trip, Derek begins by sucking Markie off, and he's just as good as before. Markie returns the favor, getting Derek nice and hard before mounting him. Dante Martin discovers that boyfriend Ethan Slade has been cheating on him and decides to fix the problem between them. He begins to kiss on Ethan's neck, waking him up as his cock begins to poke him in the back. As concierge at the hotel, it is a priority for Chris Blades that his guests are satisfied. When he opens the door, Chris quickly finds out what Quentin Gainz will request. He throws Chris onto the bed and begins to have his way with the hotel employee.
title: Casual Partners
